EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners (1318450657.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Juan,
I just tried to give you a call but when your voicemail came on it said your mailbox was not set up so I was unable to leave a message. Please give me a call when you have a moment and would like to speak.
Thank you, Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
From: Steve Arhancet Sent: Wednesday, October 12, 2011 12:37 PM To: jcvcolina@gmail.com Cc: Nicolette Taylor Subject: RE: MBO Partners
Juan,
I am unfortunately in meetings all day today. Nicolette will reach out to you to answer your question.
Regards,
Steve
From: Juan Colina [mailto:jcvcolina@gmail.com] Sent: Wednesday, October 12, 2011 12:35 PM To: Steve Arhancet Subject: Re: MBO Partners
Steve: please give me a call. There is an opportunity I need to talk about. 215-203-4744 On Thu, Sep 15, 2011 at 1:34 PM, Steve Arhancet <sarhancet@mbopartners.com> wrote: Juan,
Enclosed is the calculator. We also have a new one available on our website:
http://www.mbopartners.com/#billrate
Steve
From: Juan Colina de Vivero [mailto:jcvcolina@gmail.com] Sent: Thursday, September 15, 2011 11:22 AM To: Steve Arhancet Subject: Re: MBO Partners
Steve: I am still considering working with MBO. I'm focusing on sales now. Please send me the hourly rate calculator you showed in the video. Thanks. Juan On Wed, Sep 7, 2011 at 11:05 AM, Steve Arhancet <sarhancet@mbopartners.com> wrote: Juan,
I wanted to follow up with you from our conversation regarding the services provided by MBO Partners and how that would work on your next consulting contract. I wanted to touch base and find out how that was going.
Here are a few tools that summarize our conversation from before:
This interactive tool shows the value of using a company like MBO as an alternative to incorporation: http://www.mbopartners.com/#whoweareYou can browse through the group benefits you would have access to here: http://www.mbopartners.com/mbo-exec-group-benefits There are some webinars and videos we have created that might assist you in finding your next contract:http://www.mbopartners.com/mbo-partners-webcast-index
As I mentioned once you find your next contract we can do a financial illustration showing what that income would look like being run through MBO Partners. Best of luck finding your next contract and I’ll follow up with you as promised.
If you have questions before then, feel free to schedule a convenient time for you on my online schedule: https://my.timedriver.com/C9CPC.
Regards,
Steve ___________________________________ Steve Arhancet Director, Enrollments and Market Development MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6011 f: 703.793.6081 m: 540.560.8837 e: sarhancet@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
